creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: large drawing on canvas rendered in blue and black ballpoint pen; black gradated section along the bottom and center, consisting of many layered black horizontal lines and forming a black band of pigment; blue gradated section in the center and in ULQ and URQ; rectangular sections of color dispersed throughout in colored pigments - small pink section in LRQ, long skinny white section in LRQ, small red section in LLQ, thick red painted section in center left as well as in top center, and vertical lines in ULC in green and yellow pigment; thin pink lines and scribbles along the top edge of the canvas
medium: Ballpoint pen, oil, and marker on canvas
signed: on back, in LLQ in blue ink: A. Gatti / 2015
title: Untitled (Senza titolo)
